title: Claiming Scarlett
description: When Will whisks Scarlett away to her new home she believes she is finally where she is meant to be. Home to her is anywhere Willem is. With Cy joining them Will lets his guard down, confident that the Chauderon’s are safe but what he doesn’t realize is that there is something else coming to destroy his world.All the years of waiting to have his only love back in his arms are cut short when darkness rips through his home stealing the only thing from him he values the most.No one is free from his suspicious eye, including Levanna, his mother. When despair sets in his only hope resides in the help of an enemy. They have the same desire to return what is theirs and destroy the one that dared take from them.(New Adult, contains mature situations and sexual content)New edition coming September 2015
author: Nicole T. Smith
